questions.question: I asked how old you ..............................
questions.description: Although the reporting verb is in the past tense, a present tense is possible in the reported speech if the original speaker and the reporter are in the same situation.

questions.question: She told me that she .............................. to my father.
questions.description: The original speaker's present perfect and past tenses are often reported using past perfect tenses.

questions.question: I asked him what ........................................
questions.description: In reported questions constructed with who, what or which, be can go before or after the complement.

questions.question: She asked which ...............................................
questions.description: In reported questions constructed with who, what or which, be can go before or after the complement.

questions.question: The ancient Greeks and Romans thought that the sun ........................................... around the earth.
questions.description: The original speaker's simple present is often reported using simple past.

questions.question: I want to know if I ............................................ be needed tomorrow.
questions.description: When the reporting verb is in the present tense, the original speaker's simple future is reported using simple future.

questions.question: He said that he ..................................... to go home and left.
questions.description: When the reporting verb is in the past tense, the verb in the reported speech will also be in the past tense.

questions.question: I asked where ...................................... staying.
questions.description: In reported questions, the auxiliary verb goes after the subject.

questions.question: I knew how .......................................
questions.description: The auxiliary do is not used in reported questions.

questions.question: He suggested ....................................... quit.
questions.description: Infinitive structures cannot be used after suggest.

questions.question: The doctor said ........................................... smoking.
questions.description: Infinitive structures cannot be used after say.

questions.question: He said that he .................................. Maria at the club a few days before.
questions.description: The original speaker's present perfect and past tenses are often reported using past perfect tenses.
